name: TinyFlowChart

fetch.description: Multiterminal dot asynchronous flowchart AsyncFlowchart data and configured loading methods.
fetch.description_zh: 多端 dot 异步流程图 AsyncFlowchart 数据和配置的加载方法。

events.name: click-blank
events.description: Triggered when an empty space is clicked.

events.name: click-group
events.description: Triggered when you click on a group.

events.name: click-link
events.description: Triggered when you click on the connection.

events.name: click-node
events.description: Triggered when a node is clicked.

methods.name: createConfig
methods.description: The Flowchart component, a static method for creating the graphical base configuration.
methods.description_zh: 流程图组件 Flowchart 的静态方法，用于创建图形基础配置。

methods.name: layout
methods.description: The multi-dot dot mode is used to process the custom layout of the graph, set on the global configuration, and the parameters are the graph width, height, and node list, and the position of each node is expected to be obtained.
methods.description_zh: 多端 dot 点模式下用于处理图形的自定义布局，设置在全局配置上，参数为图形宽、高和节点列表，期望获取每个节点的位置。

methods.name: linkPath
methods.description: The multi-terminal dot point mode is used to handle the custom layout of the graphic connection, which is set on the global configuration, and the parameters are the connection and node list, and the path, midpoint and gradient of the connection are expected to be obtained. Connected paths are represented by inflection points of horizontal and vertical polylines.
methods.description_zh: 多端 dot 点模式下用于处理图形连线的自定义布局，设置在全局配置上，参数为连线和节点列表，期望获取连线的路径、中点和渐变。连线路径通过水平垂直折线的拐点表示。

methods.name: Node
methods.description: Node component built into the multi-terminal dot point mode.
methods.description_zh: 多端 dot 点模式下内置的节点组件。

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: After modifying the configuration or data, the graph used to refresh the AsyncFlowchart instance of the multiterminal asynchronous flowchart.
methods.description_zh: 在修改配置或数据之后，用于刷新多端异步流程图 AsyncFlowchart 实例的图形。

methods.name: renderInner
methods.description: The custom rendering method of the node in the multi-terminal stream card mode is the internal content of the card, excluding the card container.
methods.description_zh: 多端流卡片模式下节点的自定义渲染方法，渲染的内容为卡片内部内容，不包括卡片容器。

methods.name: renderOuter
methods.description: Custom rendering method for nodes in multi-terminal card mode, including card containers.
methods.description_zh: 多端卡片模式下节点的自定义渲染方法，渲染的内容包括卡片容器。

methods.name: resizeMixin
methods.description: The horizontal adaptive width of the graph is used to process the multiterminal dot in dot mode, which is later built into the asynchronous flowchart in point mode.
methods.description_zh: 多端 dot 点模式下用于处理图形的水平自适应宽度，后续在点模式的异步流程图中被内置。

description: 该组件可以用来定制流程图，不依赖其它库或组件。默认的实现支持有状态的节点和连线，支持节点和连线以及空白区域的点击事件。也支持通过插槽个性化定制节点，支持通过配置项控制连线的样式等。
description_zh: 该组件可以用来定制流程图，不依赖其它库或组件。默认的实现支持有状态的节点和连线，支持节点和连线以及空白区域的点击事件。也支持通过插槽个性化定制节点，支持通过配置项控制连线的样式等。
